sentences.sContent: Another aspect of this problem is control of asthma among children in these populations.
sentences.sContent_eng: Another aspect of this problem is control of asthma among children in these populations.
sentences.sCn: 这个问题的另一个方面是在这些群体的儿童中控制哮喘。

phrases.pCn: 支气管哮喘；支气管性气喘

trans.tranOther: a medical condition that causes difficulties in breathing
